Articles.Content:
So, I've been wondering for a while now, is it possible for all the planets to align in a single line?

If not whats the closest they can get?
I'm sure it's possible, but it would take a really long time. you could always launch a vessel into a solar orbit (or just sit it on the pad) and accelerate time until they finally do.
Eeloo and Jool are on a 3:2 orbit, so it isn't possible.

Let's assume the orbits are circles, and you want all of the planets to be within a degree of each other.

Moho and Eve are within a degree of each other 1/360th of the time. Kerbin is also there 1/360th of those times. Duna is there 1/360th of those times, and Jool is there 1/360th of those times. I'm ignoring Dres and Eeloo for the same reasons we humans ignore Ceres and Pluto

So that's 1/360*360*360*360th of the time, or 1 out of every 16,796,160,000 random setups will have a nice line-up.
